topic.topicDialog:
Using the Manage Accounts option will allow you to edit multiple Students' registration years and classes, delete multiple accounts and set students as leavers on-screen through Kerboodle.

If you'd like to edit more specific details, such as the Username, Password, First Name, Last Name or Email Address, please have a look at the Editing multiple accounts using the Import function tutorial.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the screen and re-enter your password to access the Admin area.
Use the Filter and Search options to find the students you would like to edit.
Use the tick boxes to select your students.

You then have the option to:

1. Edit the Registration Year and Class

2. Set the students as Leavers

3. Delete the Accounts
The changes will then take place immediately.
